sentences.en: Excision of an obnoxious passage was required.
sentences.cn: 有一段引起反感的文字必须删掉.

sentences.en: His disgusting table manners made him obnoxious to me.
sentences.cn: 他那令人厌恶的吃相使我反感.

sentences.en: His disgusting table manners made him obnoxious to us.
sentences.cn: 他令人厌恶的吃相使我们觉得他是讨人厌的.

sentences.en: I find your behavior obnoxious; please mend your ways.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你的行为令人厌恶, 请您如何修补.

sentences.en: It had an obnoxious smell and burnt with a smoky.
sentences.cn: 它有一种令人不快的气味,而且燃烧时多烟.

sentences.en: Nick walked in the boardroom sporting an obnoxious necktie.
sentences.cn: 里克在(议事)会议室里走来走去地炫耀着他的造作的领带.

sentences.en: One of the parents was a most obnoxious character. No-one liked him.
sentences.cn: 其中一位家长极为惹人厌，没人喜欢他。

sentences.en: She shook herself free from his hand and said, " Obnoxious!
sentences.cn: 孙小姐扭头抖开他的手道: “ 讨厌!

sentences.en: She was obese and the object of constant obnoxious teasing.
sentences.cn: 她过于肥胖,常常是可恶的戏弄瞄准的目标.

sentences.en: So his anger switched to his daughter, who grew more and more obnoxious in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 怒气便拐了弯儿, 越看姑娘越不顺眼.

sentences.en: The people at my table were so obnoxious I simply had to change my seat.
sentences.cn: 我那桌的人如此讨厌，我只好换了座位。

sentences.en: These fires produce really obnoxious fumes and smoke.
sentences.cn: 这些火炉冒出来的烟气确实很难闻.

sentences.en: This overhead can grow to obnoxious and painful proportions if the program is used daily.
sentences.cn: 如果是常用程序,那么这方面的负担会增加到令人厌恶的程度.

trans.tran_cn: 讨厌的，易受伤害，应受谴责的
